thread.section_title: SmartBuyGlasses Canada Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SmartBuyGlasses Canada | smartbuyglasses.ca
thread.title: Azaria

author: Azaria
title: Azaria
text: I ordered a pair of Burberry's from SmartBuyGlasses and I couldn't have been happier with the whole process. The glasses are absolutely perfect and the price of $230 for the frame and lens (especially with my Bubbles prescription) couldn't have been beat. Not to mention after my order was processed and in Hong Kong it only took a day before they were at my front door in Kawartha Lakes Ontario. Overall couldn't be happier, would absolutely recommend
